content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity v at time t ≥ 0 is given by v(t) = sin(t2). The graph of v is shown above for \(0\le t\le\sqrt{5\pi}\). The position of the particle at time t is x(t) and its position at time t = 0 is x(0) = 5.
content.question: Find the position of the particle at time t=3.

frqParts.text: Find the position of the particle at time t=3.

topic.text: 8.3: Using Accumulation Functions and Definite Integrals in Applied Contexts

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
